permissions: User must be able to update the associated developer (developer update permission).
side_effects: Updates fields on a developer certified weigher record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --number or --is-active must be provided. --is-active must be "true" or "false" when provided. Developer and user cannot be changed after creation. The combination of developer, user, and number must be unique.

flags.name: --is-active
flags.validation: Must be true or false (e.g., false).
